NewsDetails.TitleText: Tekserve Named Adobe® Anywhere Authorized System Integrator
NewsDetails.ContentText:
Company to Demo Collaborative Video Workflow Solutions with EMC Isilon at the 2014 NAB Show
NEW YORK CITY, MARCH 31, 2014 – Tekserve, a leading provider of technology solutions for creative professionals in a variety of markets, announced today that it has been named an official Adobe® Anywhere Authorized System Integrator. Further, at this year’s NAB show, Tekserve will demonstrate the

NewsDetails.TitleText: The Software-Defined Data Center: Potential Game Changer
NewsDetails.ContentText:
If I were to choose one technology breakthrough that completely revolutionized the way data centers are designed and managed, I’d choose server virtualization platforms like VMware, Hyper-V, Xen, and KVM. There are a number of reasons why server virtualization has been so beneficial, including hardware cost savings, decreased data center footprint, and eliminating vendor lock-in.
?

NewsDetails.TitleText: Malaysia in vanguard of global certifications, say VMware, MDeC
NewsDetails.ContentText:
The full range of VMware certifications, which includes the new data centre virtualisation course, is now part of the MSC Malaysia MyProCert (SRI) programme, said MDeC CEO Datuk Badlisham Ghazali.
Photo - Laurence Si, Country Manager, VMware Malaysia.

NewsDetails.TitleText: VMware reveals more VSAN nodes
NewsDetails.ContentText:
Cisco, Dell and Fujistsu having a waft and the clock is ticking
VMware launched its virtual storage area network (VSAN) back on March 6th and promised hardware partners would reveal their “VSAN Ready Nodes” within 30 days.…

NewsDetails.TitleText: Softchoice, VMware Study: Most Data Centers Need a Rehaul
NewsDetails.ContentText:
A new study by Softchoice and VMware has found that most North American IT organizations are still utilizing outdated data centers, which could be cutting into their efficiency and overall profitability.
Like many cars on the road that are an average of 10 years old , data centers across North America are also beginning to show some grey streaks, according to a joint study by technology

NewsDetails.TitleText: CSC, VMware Expand Partnership with Hybrid Cloud Solution
NewsDetails.ContentText:
CSC, the company behind BizCloud and CSC CloudCompute, is extending its partnership with VMware to offer customers a hybrid cloud brokering solution for VMware Hybrid Service, which will help users to develop and move workloads between the two companies' cloud services.

NewsDetails.TitleText: Astute Networks to Showcase ViSX All-Flash Storage Appliance at Seattle VMware User Conference
NewsDetails.ContentText:
SAN DIEGO, CA -- (Marketwired) -- 03/28/14 -- Astute Networks ™, Inc., the leading provider of Networked Flash™ appliances, today announced it will join together with Seattle's VMware user community to discuss virtualization trends, best practices and the latest technology during the VMUG User Conference , taking place on April 1, from 7:30 a.m. - 5:30 p.m. (Hyatt Regency Bellevue).

NewsDetails.TitleText: VMware, Nvidia Revolutionizing Secure Cloud Desktop
NewsDetails.ContentText:
CIO — It's been an interesting few decades since Oracle and Sun Microsystems argued that we should shift computing from the desktop to servers and first created somewhat-viable thin clients — when I say "interesting," I mean the solutions. From the standpoint of the user and in terms of cost, generally stunk.

NewsDetails.TitleText: VMware Is Worth Buying
NewsDetails.ContentText:
VMware performed very well in 2013 and the growth outlook for the next two years is impressive.
Horizon DaaS has beaten Amazon’s WorkSpace.
India is emerging as a lucrative opportunity to avail.
AirWatch has Strengthened VMware's MDM Offerings
The competition for VMware ( VMW ) is growing and to strengthen its position VMware recently acquired AirWatch for $1.5 billion. ?

NewsDetails.TitleText: Softchoice and VMware Study Finds Most Organizations Have an Outdated Datacenter
NewsDetails.ContentText:
According to their own employees, 58% of organizations take too long to deploy new applications
TORONTO, March 27, 2014 /CNW/ - With the rise of mobile and cloud computing, most organizations lack the IT infrastructure needed to respond quickly to front office and customer needs, according to a new study by Softchoice, a North American technology solutions and services provider, and

NewsDetails.TitleText: DataCore Ready Nexsan E-Series storage arrays
NewsDetails.ContentText: Imation has announced that its Nexsan™ E-Series™ storage arrays have been certified as DataCore Ready. When combined with the DataCore SANsymphony-V storage virtualization platform, the solution offers data centers rapid ROI through significant improvements in data availability, agility, performance and flexibility.

NewsDetails.TitleText: Nvidia, VMware join to pipe high-quality 3D graphics from the cloud
NewsDetails.ContentText:
GTC Nvidia and VMware have announced that the graphics company's GRID technology is now available on the virtualization giant's desktop-as-a-service (DaaS) platform to deliver 3D graphics to enterprise desktops through cloud service providers.
In addition, the two companies are working together to bring Nvidia's virtual GPU technology ( vGPU ) to VMware's ESX-based systems – an offering

NewsDetails.TitleText: VMware's Gelsinger: Datacenters Face 'Tectonic Shift'
NewsDetails.ContentText:
Virtualization and cloud computing are creating the most significant shift in datacenter design in 25 years, VMware CEO Pat Gelsinger will tell Interop audience in keynote address.
VMware CEO Pat Gelsinger says virtualization and cloud computing have produced a "tectonic shift" in IT operations that will result in software-defined datacenters replacing hardware-defined datacenters. ?

NewsDetails.TitleText: Ensim, Hitachi Add vSphere Support to UCP for Turnkey Cloud Ops
NewsDetails.ContentText:
Hitachi Data Systems and Ensim Corp. have teamed to support HDS's Unified Compute Platform (UCP) for VMware vSphere converged infrastructure. Both companies say the collaboration will also allow HDS customers to leverage EAS capabilities as general-purpose service catalogs for product ordering.

NewsDetails.TitleText: VMware Names Ingram Micro Distributor of the Year for Americas
NewsDetails.ContentText:
Ingram Micro announced that it has been given the distinction of Distributor of the Year in VMware's Americas Region Partner Network. The announcement comes on the heels of Ingram Micro's recent expansion with VMware into the US federal market.
VMware (VMW) has recognized Ingram Micro (IM) as its Americas Region VMware Partner Network Distributor of the Year. The award was

NewsDetails.TitleText: Take the migraines out of your Windows 7 migration with Dell Software and VMWare
NewsDetails.ContentText:
With Microsoft support for Windows XP ending on April 8, many legacy users are dreading the change. Thinking about the days needed to move applications, the risks of human error, and fears about data being lost are enough to keep IT managers up at night — and to delay migrations as long as possible.
Dell Software and VMware® are working together to take the pain out of the migration

NewsDetails.TitleText: Understanding VMware VAAI Offloads And Unloads
NewsDetails.ContentText: It’s hard to believe that it’s been less than three years since VMware's vStorage APIs for Array Integration (VAAI) first allowed us to offload tasks from servers to the storage array. Today, many virtualization experts, including this not so humble reporter, consider VAAI support a required feature for storage systems in virtualized data centers. However, users shouldn’t consider

NewsDetails.TitleText: Jeremy Burton, Denis Cashman, Jonathan Martin Take New EMC Info Infrastructure Unit Roles
NewsDetails.ContentText:
Jeremy Burton, Denis Cashman and Jonathan Martin have been appointed to senior executive positions within EMC ‘s (NYSE: EMC) information infrastructure segment, the company announced Tuesday .
As president of products and marketing, Burton will oversee the segment’s product areas, technical alliances, the information intelligence group and the office of the chief technology officer.

NewsDetails.ContentText:
Koenig Solutions Ltd. has announced that it has received the VMware Partner Network Training Partner of the Year award for the Asia Pacific Region and the VMware Authorized Training Center Partner of the Year 2013 for SAARC region.

NewsDetails.TitleText: NVIDIA brings graphics-rich environments to VMware Horizon DaaS
NewsDetails.ContentText:
NVIDIA and VMware have teamed up to bring NVIDIA GRID technology to the virtualisation giant's Horizon DaaS Platform.
Bringing GRID into VMware’s desktop-as-a-service offering will, the organisations claim, enable the delivery of 3D graphics onto virtualised desktops and applications.
VMware Horizon DaaS was launched earlier this month as a cost-effective way to deliver virtual

NewsDetails.TitleText: NVIDIA, VMware Offer Graphic-Rich Desktops
NewsDetails.ContentText: With desktop virtualization becoming the top priority for most organizations, NVIDIA Corp. ( NVDA ) and VMware, Inc. ( VMW ) recently announced a strategic alliance to run NVIDIA GRID technology on VMware Horizon Desktop-as-a-Service (DaaS) Platform. NewsDetails.TitleText: Google Cloud Price Cuts Bode Ill for EMC, NTAP, IBM, Says Barclays
NewsDetails.ContentText:

NewsDetails.TitleText: Emerging Storage Driving EMC's Hardware Sales, Price Estimate Revised To $30
NewsDetails.ContentText: EMC ( EMC ) has maintained its market leading position in the data storage systems arena over the last decade. In recent years, the company has cemented its top spot with a growing share in the external disk storage market. According to IDC estimates, EMC’s market share in the storage hardware segment is over 30% , which is about two-and-a-half times that of its nearest competitor,

NewsDetails.TitleText: Virtacore Leverages Cisco UCS; Why buy the cow?
NewsDetails.ContentText: Virtacore, a leading cloud services provider specializing in Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) solutions utilizing VMware, is enabling organizations to leverage Enterprise Cisco UCS blade technology without the large upfront capital expenditures required to build, deploy and manage such an enterprise architecture. The UCS provides Virtacore and its clients embedded management of all

NewsDetails.TitleText: Dan Dougherty of EMC: Mobile, M2M Tech Could Spur Big Data Use in Federal Healthcare
NewsDetails.ContentText:
A new MeriTalk survey commissioned by EMC Corp. has identified federal healthcare as a prime market for big data technologies, prompted by mobile and machine-to-machine tools.
Two out of three federal executives surveyed believe big data will have the largest impact on population health management, patient care in the military health system and preventive care, MeriTalk said Monday .

NewsDetails.TitleText: Two Thirds of Feds Say Big Data Will Improve Population Health Management and Preventative Care
NewsDetails.ContentText: MeriTalk , a public-private partnership focused on improving the outcomes of government IT, today announced the results of its new report, " The Big Data Cure ." The study, underwritten by EMC Corporation , surveyed Federal executives focused on healthcare and healthcare research to examine the current state of Big Data in Federal healthcare. The report found that emerging

NewsDetails.TitleText: ITsavvy Announces VMware Premier Partner Status
NewsDetails.ContentText:
ITsavvy, one of the fastest growing companies of its type in the U.S., just announced that it has been awarded Premier Level status in VMware’s Solution Provider Program by meeting all of the revenue, competency and certification requirements.

NewsDetails.ContentText: SANTA CLARA, CA--(Marketwired - Mar 25, 2014) - Ensim Corporation , a leading provider of automation and orchestration solutions to service providers and enterprises, today announced that Hitachi Data Systems (HDS) has selected the Ensim Automation Suite to support Hitachi Unified Compute Platform (UCP) for VMware vSphere converged infrastructure.
